plot: When a fun night out turns dangerous for three teens, Melinda investigates an unsolved kidnapping that may put her in more danger than she anticipated.

Three college boys, seeking their way at night to a party through the woods, come upon and run into trouble at a deserted barn, where one disappears. At a terrified survivor's request, Eli and Melinda look into the matter and soon, finding not just the recently vanished student at issue but an elusive ghost attached to an eleven-year-old unsolved murder/kidnapping, bring in the police to help. Almost too late, Melinda learns of deceptions that put her life at risk over the matter of two million in missing ransom money.—statmanjeff
